channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
Ok, so basically all i want to do is stop dupers.
first off id like to lower the buy price of phats in shops, but keep the sell price the same, no idea where to start for that. any ideas would be appreciated.
second id like to change the currency to tokkul, i was in a server that did this and it stopped duping.
If i think of anymore ideas i cant figure out ill post.
Thanks if you help. :)

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Having rares in a shop is a bad idea anyway, Just delete that shop, and Drop a few rares when people are on to get them into the economy.

Read full topic
